subject: Football (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The coaches and players at Southern California went all-out in their efforts to persuade Silas Redd to transfer from Penn State and play running back for the No. 1-ranked Trojans.
snippet: The coaches and players at Southern California went all-out in their efforts to persuade Silas Redd to transfer from Penn State and play running back for the No. 1-ranked Trojans.
